item.title: USB Ripper
item.description: We are told that a sysadmin has been dumping all USB events on his Linux machine, but one day, some criminals enter another USB to steal information. We are given two files: $ unzip -l USB\ Ripper.zip Archive: USB Ripper.zip Length Date Time Name --------- ---------- ----- ---- 0 07-30-2019 15:54 usb-ripper/ 11734103 07-20-2019 02:19 usb-ripper/auth.json 85784244 07-20-2019 02:08 usb-ripper/syslog --------- ------- 97518347 3 files These two files contain a lot of lines:
